forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West wind 8 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 52. West wind 12 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
The afternoon unfolds in Downtown San Francisco with a serene brightness. The sun shines upon the cityscape, painting the familiar horizon with clarity, where gentle breezes carry the freshness of spring. As the day progresses, temperatures glide from a pleasant height, lingering near the mid-60s, to a comfortable late afternoon coolness, hovering a bit lower. The vibrant light casts warm hues on the historic buildings, while the west winds, rustling through the streets at 8 to 17 mph, provide an invigorating touch.

As evening approaches, the sky will don a softer motif, with partly cloudy aspects revealing a low in the early 50s, inviting the city to settle into its twilight charm. Tonight’s gustier winds at 12 to 18 mph offer that familiar coastal crispness. A light jacket will serve well against the brisk air if you wander to a nearby café or embrace a stroll along the waterfront. With such delightful weather, a visit to Golden Gate Park for a leisurely walk or simply enjoying a book in one of its sun-kissed meadows can perfectly encapsulate this picturesque day.
